name: Yo ho ho, and an alien gun!
name_original: Yo ho ho, and an alien gun!
description:
Requires a gamepad. Also there's only a Mac build available, sorry! The github repo is at https://github.com/robsws/yo-ho-ho-and-an-alien-gun if you would like to build it yourself.

Rotate the left stick left or right as if you were moving a steering wheel.

Use the right trigger to fire.

I had much higher hopes for how far I'd get with this, but I'm happy to have completed something having started from scratch with Bevy this week. I will go into the next jam a bit better prepared!
